strings.string: A device pulled through the ground in order to break it open into furrows for planting.
Are you ready to start to farm your lands with rice? Let's go!
Your mission is to work the lands to grow rice using the tools needed.
The more rice you grow and sell and the more you protect the environment the more points you will get.
During the season you will always have to take into account mainly two things; the coins and the calendar.

You can use the coins to buy tools, hire workers or investigate.
Be careful to administrate properly your resources.
Checking the calendar will help you to know which actions you can do depending on the phase you currently are.
If you don't do some actions in time, that field will be blocked until the next year!
The dictionary will indicate the start of a new phase so you can check the new actions.
Now you can check the information of the first phase.

Down to the right you can find buttons to stop or accelerate the game time.
Do not doubt to use it!
Now we will learn to build!
Here you can do a lot of things, but we now to buy now!
Now we are going to buy a base for our workers
Click on the building "Home" and then the green button "Buy".

Very good, now we already have the house bought!
Notice how the cost has been subtracted from the coin counter.
Now we learn about the workers!
In this pop up we can see the information
The first number indicates how many workers you have hired, the second how many workers fit on your house.
If you click on it you can hire more workers.
Every time you click the button you will hire a worker and your monthly costs will go up.
The total monthly cost is shown under the money box.
Be sensible and do not hire workers that you are not going to use!
For now one worker is enough
Very well, we are now going to learn about cultivate
In this window you will find what's what you need to realize the pertinent action.
To the right you have a small description of the action.
The objects you need will be shown in red and the button will get you to the shop.
In case that you have everything you will be able to apply the action.
Congratulations :) you are ready to farm your lands. Good luck!
It is sowing time! For this you need the planter
You do not have the threshing planter, build it as before
Very good! You have build it!
Now you have to click over to open the action menu
Very good! Now you just have to wait for the rice to grow to plant it into the field.
In order to the sell the rice, first you need to process it through different buildings.
The first is the threshing floor. It is where the grain is separated from the loosened chaff.
You do not have the threshing floor yet, build it as before
Very good! You have build it!
The second is the terrain. The terrain is where the rice gets cleaned and dried.
You do not have the terrain yet, build it as always.
The last one is the Rice Silo. It is where the rice is packed and stored until it gets sold.
You do not have the Rice Silo yet, but you already know how to build it.
Very good! There are the buildings you need to produce rice.
If you click over a building, the menu with information about the rice processed and the action to send it to the next building
You have to be alert because each building have a maximum capacity and the production can be blocked.
But whenever you see fit you can increase the capacity of each building on the upgrade menu.
This was all about buildings! Have a nice harvesting!
I see you are interested in building terrain. I can inform you about it!
Here you'll find the tools to transform the terrain in cultivable fields.
Canals are needed to get the water to the rice field. In the case that no water arrives to the field you will not be able to grow anything!
With new fields of rice you will be able to increment the harvest. Though you will also need more workers and materials.
Moreover you can remove building and vegetation. The terrain has to be cleared in order to build in it.
I see you are interested in building canals. That's a good sign! I can tell you more about it.
Remember canals serve to get water to the rice fields. Without it you cannot cultivate.
This way of building you can build several canals at once.
Click in every place you want to build.
If you don't finally want to build some of these canals you can click again in it to remove it.
On the popup the total price of all the canals will be indicated. Then you can confirm or cancel with the buttons.
Remember if the terrain is not cleared, you won't be able to build in it. The tool to clean will be useful to you.
I see you are interested in clearing terrain. That's a good sign! I can tell you more about it.
Remember that the terrain have to be cleared to be able to build in it.
In this mode you can clear several zones of terrain at once.
Click in every place you want to clear.
If you don't finally want clear some of these places, you can click again again to leave it as it was.
On the popup the total price of all the canals will be indicated. Then you can confirm or cancel with the buttons.
Be careful! The harvest is on danger!
It is normal that weed and plagues appear.
Still you have to be alert because they spread quickly, weaken plants and then the field will produce less rice.
You will be able to remove them in different ways.
But some herbicides and insecticides are toxic and on the delta we take care of our environment.
If you use environment friendly methods you will be rewarded at the end of the year.
You have unlocked the co-operative and from now on you will be member of it. You will produce together with the other members.
The better production of the co-op, the more it will be able to invest in helping its members and you will gain some advantages for it.
These bonuses are divided on four branches with 5 levels every one. Now we will explain each in detail.
Depending on the total rice produced your level increases. Every level increases a percentage of the price that you get from selling rice.
Depending o the total rice produced the last year your level increases. Each level gives you a bonus in the stats of your buildings.
Taking care of the delta's environment is very important. Investigate in this field when you can.
You get two levels if you uniquely use ecological herbicides and fertilizer.
You get another level if you don't cast away migratory birds from your fields.
You get another level if you haven't burnt the stubble and you leave the field flooded after harvesting.
At last there is one permanent if you invest in researching new method to take care of the environment.
There is another bonus that depends on the quantity of fields you have active in your terrain. Every level gives you a discount whenever you buy tools.
Taking care of the delta's environment is very important. You will receive a grant depending on your level of ecology in the cooperative.
You get two levels if you uniquely use ecological herbicides and fertilizer.
You get another level if you don't cast away migratory birds from your fields.
You get another level if you leave the field flooded after harvesting.
At last there is one permanent if you invest in researching new method to take care of the environment.
Sorry, this patch is disabled until the next harvesting season. This happens whenever you do not do an action in the right phase. Better luck next year!
Attention. You are in red number, if you stay a year that each month you end in red number you will lose the game.
You have been too long being bankrupt
kg of rice in the terrain
kg of rice in the rice silo
It is not the sowing phase.
No space left in the stable
No space left in the garage
This allows you to building water canals
This allows you to build rice fields
This allow you to clean rice fields from vegetation
Congratulations! You have reached the maximum bonus
out of 5. Remember that not using organic products or burn stubble make you lose points.
t. of rice in the cooperative from the goal of
t. of rice in the cooperative from the goal of
% to the speed of processing in the buildings
No space left in the house
you are the only one left
To favor the ecosystem of the delta, leftovers are buried.
Floodgates are open to let the water go to the canal.
Tool to prepare the terrain that consists to make a cut of 10 cm. turning it.
A minimum layer of water is left in the field.
Farming technique in which you sow and plant the rice in the same field.
Apply products to fight against weeds and wild rice.
Weeds are cut with the sickle under the water.
Wild rice are cut with the sickle under the water.
Supplement the ground fertilizer with nitrogen.
After the vegetative phase the entrance and the exit of water is regulated.
Before sowing you also can puddle to prevent and erase wild rice.
Fertilize the land with the adequate quantity of nitrogenous and phosphorous fertilizers.
Floodgates are open to let the water go through the canal leaving a minimum water layer.
Reaping the harvest with the sickle but without the help of a small boat to carry the rice.
Load the harvest to the cart and get it to the terrain to separate the loosened chaff from the rice.
Plant sheaves got from the planter in the field without the help of a small boat to carry them.
Before sowing you can also use puddling to prevent and/or erase weeds.
It uses a table that drags the mud to even the ground under the water.
After harvesting you leave the stubble in the field. Once dried is stacked, burnt and fallow it.
Before sowing you can also puddle to prevent and/or erase weeds.
This modern technique allows laser to calculate how machinery will even the land.
Reaping the harvest with sickle and with the help of a small boat to carry the rice.
Plant sheaves got from the planter to the field with the help of a small boat to carry them.
Before sowing you can also puddle to prevent and/or erase weeds.
Even with tractor and grader mechanically.
This action will decrease the probability of weeds to appear
Carry the harvest with a trailer and a tractor to the terrain to separate the loosened chaff from the rice.
Organic fertilizer with the main nutrients.
Supplement the ground fertilizer with nitrogen with organic products
Before sowing you can also use puddling to prevent and/or erase wild rice.
Apply organic products to fight weeds and wild rice.
Apply the treatment or the right method to fight the plague.
Insect that eats the rice plant.
This worm eats the rice plant from the inside.
They are a kind of mosquito that affect the seed of the plant.
A device pulled through the ground in order to break it open into furrows for planting.
Domestic horse to work the land
Module to engage to a tractor in order to apply herbicide in the rice field
Tool used to reap or hoe grass
Fertilizer to use with a tractor
Module to engage to a tractor in order to apply fertilizer in the rice field
Organic fertilizer to use with a tractor
Fertilizer bag to apply for the worker directly to the camp.
It is used to carry things through the rice field. It is usually pulled by a horse.
Used to carry rice, tools, etc.
Fertilizer to use with a tractor
Coupler to carry rice, tools, etc.
Piece of wood to even the terrain
Module to even the terrain using state of the art technology
Tractor module to plough the land
Tractor module to sow the seeds
Organic fertilizer to use with a tractor
Organic herbicide to use with a tractor.
Herbicide to use with a tractor
First phase of the terrain preparations
The terrain is cleaned and if it was flooded it starts to dry it up to leave it ready. This phase ranges from 16 to 31 of January.
Second phase of the terrain preparations
We continue with the preparation tasks before sowing. This phase ranges from March 1th to April 15th.
It is time to sow the rice either in the planter or in the same field if you researched no-till farming. This phase ranges from April 16th to May 8th.
It starts the vegetative phase of the plant and it is now when most weeds appear. Now you should be careful specially with theses ones. This phase ranges from 9 to 31 of May.
It is time to plant the rice, getting what you sow from the planter or preparing the terrain if you researched no-till farming. This phase ranges from June 1st to July 15th.
It is time to harvest the rice. Be careful with weeds, they will low your production, so clean the field before reaping. This phase ranges from September 1st to October 15th.
Now it is time to take care of your terrain after harvesting. This phase ranges from October 16th to November 15th.
Currently you are between phases. You can take advantage to maintain your land or if you have reaped the harvest is the moment to handle the rice treatment and selling.
Increase and renew the water level
The quantity of workers you can hire it is determined for its size.
The stable is where animals live. Its size determines how many animals can live in it.
The garage is where machinery is stored (tractors, trailers, etc.). Its size determines how many machinery you can buy.
It is where the rice plants are sown. Then theses plants are planted on the field.
Threshing floor is where the grain is separated from the loosened chaff before dry it up.
The terrain is where the rice is cleaned and dried up.
Here rice is where the rice is packed and stored until it gets sold in the distribution zone increasing the coin counter.
Modernization of production processes has led that the final treatment is concentrated in the same building.
Little orchards done in the field laterals. They are used for the own consumption and avoid weeds. It gives 5% more for the rice selling. Reduce a 10% the weed appearance.
Iron wheels are used to go faster in muddied areas. Give a 10% more of rice produced.
Little plantations of canes worked as wind shield. This way the planter stayed protected. Add 25% to the planter capacity.
During the rice is harvested the watering holes distribute the water among the workers. Increase a 10% the rice produced.
The small boats are unlocked to use in the fields.
Unlocks the industrial rice plant that concentrates in one building is processed from the harvest. This plant replaces the threshing floor, the terrain and the rice silo.
When you decrease the water level, it appears new plants that can be sold. Increase a 5% the coins per rice sold. Reduce a 10% the weed appearance.
Some people manufacture the "boves" providing an extra profit. Increase a 5% the coins per rice sold.
Chamber’s Rice Grower have the hallmark of the Denomination of Origin "Arròs the Delta de l' Ebre", boosting sales.
Research oriented to ecological issues on all the areas of the harvesting.
Product used to erase weeds but respecting the environment.
Unlocks chemical fertilizers to add to the soil.
Unlocks this product used to erase weeds.
This changes the way to sow rice. With no-till farming you can plant directly on the same rice field instead of doing it in the planter and altering minimally the soil.
It founds the Chamber’s Rice Grower and give access to the upgrades this grants.
Unlock a grant depending on how well you protect the environment.
Unlocks the laser grader module for tractor.
Organic fertilizers to add to the soil.
Create pheromones traps. Decrease the appearance of plagues a 25%.
Unlock the mechanical grader module for tractor.
Unlocks the tractor module to sow the seeds.
The use of bats and blue lights to the control of plagues. Decrease the appearance of plagues a 25%.
Tool used to loosen or turn the soil.
You have opened the research window! Here you can conduct research to improve the way you farm
Some of theses investigations include herbicides, tools, or direct improvements to the harvesting techniques
To investigate, you only have to select the research and click the button. You will have to wait to the next year for the research to be active.
Every research is useful. However you have to take into account that they are a bit expensive. Choice wisely!
rice fields builded of the current goal
The rice that you want to send do not fit, if you continue you will lose the part left over.
If you start a new game you will lose your game saved.
Do Click where you want the building
